snippet.title: Ninja Combat Gameplay Demo | Ninja Must Die
snippet.description:
【Gameplay】
The tactic NINJA COMBAT!
Ninjas can play PVP real-time combat inside the game. 3V3 is a multiplayer mode and 1V1 is more like a duel! Use various skill cards with your teammates to confront your opponents in strategy!

Ninja Must die, a ninja, real-time combat, running mobile game, launches in 2022. Pre-registration IS NOW LIVE!! 


Pre-register here:
https://www.pandadagames.com/en
Official Website:
https://www.pandadagames.com
App Store:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ninja-must-die/id1628517224

⭐CBT NOW OPENS!⭐
Google Play Store Download link:
 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.pandadagames.ninja.cbt
